decks.notes: The deck revolves around a fast and aggressive strategy centered on Human creatures. By utilizing mana fixing lands and creatures, the deck aims to deploy threats quickly and efficiently. Cards like Aether Vial and Noble Hierarch help accelerate the board development, while disruptive Humans like Meddling Mage and Kitesail Freebooter disrupt the opponent's plans. The deck looks to swarm the opponent with a growing board presence, utilizing synergies between creatures like Thalia's Lieutenant and Champion of the Parish to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The deck is focused on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage in order to stall the game until it can win with powerful finishers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria. The deck's key strength lies in its ability to answer threats efficiently and consistently, while setting up its win conditions to take over the game in the late stages. By controlling the pace of the game and out-valuing the opponent, the deck aims to establish dominance and secure victory through superior card advantage and board control.

This deck focuses on utilizing Hardened Scales to boost the +1/+1 counters on creatures and create a powerful aggro strategy. Cards like Walking Ballista, Arcbound Ravager, and Hangarback Walker become even more threatening with the additional counters. The deck also includes various support cards like Steel Overseer and Animation Module to further enhance the synergies with +1/+1 counters. By consistently adding counters and aggressively attacking opponents, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a burst of damage and win the game quickly.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying a board of Spirit creatures with the help of cards like Collected Company and Noble Hierarch, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Spell Queller and Drogskol Captain. The inclusion of cards like Selfless Spirit and Rattlechains help protect your creatures and maintain aggression. The mana base is designed to provide the right colors of mana for casting your spells efficiently. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of powerful flying spirits and maintain control of the battlefield.

The key concept of this Hardened Scales Aggro deck is to rapidly increase the power and toughness of your creatures by utilizing cards like Hardened Scales, Steel Overseer, and Arcbound Ravager. By combining these cards with modular creatures like Hangarback Walker and Walking Ballista, you can create a fast and overwhelming board presence. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Throne of Geth and Animation Module to further enhance your creature's abilities. The deck aims to quickly build a formidable army of creatures and overrun your opponent before they have a chance to respond.

The deck focuses on utilizing the synergy and efficiency of Human creatures in order to establish a fast and aggressive board presence. By utilizing cards like Aether Vial and Ancient Ziggurat to quickly cast powerful creatures such as Thalia's Lieutenant, Mantis Rider, and Champion of the Parish, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of creatures. Additionally, disruptive creatures like Reflector Mage and Kitesail Freebooter help to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining pressure. The mana base is streamlined to support the Human tribal theme and ensure consistent plays.

The deck focuses on creating a powerful, hard-to-remove creature by stacking multiple aura enchantments on a hexproof creature like Slippery Bogle or Gladecover Scout. This allows the player to quickly build up a formidable threat while protecting it from targeted removal spells thanks to hexproof. With cards like Ethereal Armor, Rancor, and Daybreak Coronet, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a huge, evasive creature that can quickly finish the game. Leyline of Sanctity provides protection against targeted discard spells, further solidifying the deck's aggressive strategy.

This Aggro deck focuses on maximizing the potential of +1/+1 counters through the use of Hardened Scales. By utilizing creatures like Walking Ballista, Hangarback Walker, and Arcbound Ravager alongside Steel Overseer, the deck aims to quickly build up a powerful board presence and overwhelm the opponent. With key cards like Karn, Scion of Urza and Throne of Geth providing additional support and synergies, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish off opponents before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using powerful red control spells and creatures. By utilizing cards like Anger of the Gods, Chandra, Torch of Defiance, and Blood Moon, this deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining board control. The deck also includes big red creatures like Glorybringer and Stormbreath Dragon to apply pressure and close out the game quickly. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Relic of Progenitus and Abrade helps to disrupt the opponent's graveyard and threats. By combining control elements with big red creatures, this deck aims to dominate the battlefield and secure victory.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on quickly putting powerful Eldrazi creatures onto the battlefield to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing Eldrazi Temple and the Urza's lands to ramp up mana production, the deck can drop huge threats like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer early in the game. Chalice of the Void helps disrupt opponents' game plans, while cards like All Is Dust and Dismember provide removal options. The deck also includes utility lands like Ghost Quarter and Scavenger Grounds to deal with opposing threats, making it a versatile and aggressive deck in Modern 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on aggressive play using a mix of Human creatures and spells to swarm the opponent quickly. By utilizing cards like Champion of the Parish, Mantis Rider, and Thalia's Lieutenant, the deck aims to build a strong board presence and put pressure on the opponent early in the game. Cards like Meddling Mage and Kitesail Freebooter help disrupt the opponent's game plan, while Aether Vial and Noble Hierarch provide additional support and versatility. The mana base is optimized for casting Humans efficiently and effectively.

The main concept of this Modern Combo - Infect deck is to quickly pump up and protect your infect creatures, such as Glistener Elf and Blighted Agent, to deal lethal poison damage to your opponent. The deck includes a variety of pump spells like Mutagenic Growth, Vines of Vastwood, and Might of Old Krosa, as well as protection spells like Blossoming Defense and Distortion Strike. With efficient mana acceleration from Noble Hierarch and strong land choices, the deck aims to win the game before the opponent can mount a defense.

The deck focuses on aggressively using graveyard strategies to power out big creatures like Hollow One and Gurmag Angler. It utilizes cards like Goblin Lore and Burning Inquiry to quickly fill the graveyard while also dealing damage to the opponent. The deck can quickly overwhelm opponents with a combination of recurring threats like Bloodghast and Flamewake Phoenix, along with efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Collective Brutality. Overall, the deck aims to close out games quickly through a mix of explosive starts and resilient threats.

This deck revolves around using cards that allow you to quickly fill your graveyard and lower your life total to maximize the power of Death's Shadow, a key creature in the deck. The goal is to aggressively disrupt your opponent's hand and board state while setting up for a big attack with Death's Shadow and other powerful delve creatures like Gurmag Angler. The deck is also built to protect your threats with cards like Stubborn Denial and disrupt your opponent's game plan with targeted discard spells.

The deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Tower, Power Plant, and Mine) to produce large amounts of mana quickly. It then utilizes powerful control spells like Oblivion Stone and Karn Liberated to maintain board control and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also includes powerful win conditions such as Wurmcoil Engine, Walking Ballista, and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger to quickly close out games once it has established control. Additionally, the deck includes card draw and deck manipulation tools like Ancient Stirrings and Sylvan Scrying to find key pieces efficiently.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with creatures, allowing for explosive plays with cards like Vengevine and Bridge from Below. By utilizing cards like Faithless Looting and Stitcher's Supplier, the deck can easily enable powerful combos like bringing back Vengevine multiple times in a turn. The inclusion of cards like Walking Ballista and Viscera Seer provide additional utility and ways to close out the game. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast, graveyard-based combo strategy.
